Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Looks like the fortification of the periphery is complete. I thought I was going to have to come back later and do it.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Without the commandant and Karenina, wouldn't this have turned out like what I was worried about?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Regardless, we're out of time. Ask Karenina to announce our next construction project.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Wait, why do you quit? Without you, we'll be back to having Lee on our hides all day, every day...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Like I said, I don't wanna get all buddy-buddy with you!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Maybe tomorrow I'll get an order, then have to watch my weapons turn against you... I finally get why Bianca has it rough.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "You don't wanna be with this kind of person. So...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "It's no use thinking too far ahead. Since we are all Constructs, we can become Corrupted at any moment. So let's just keep each other at arm's length...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Come together now for there to be a future.', 3: '33'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Karenina, what the commandant means is that we need to form a close bond with each other, otherwise our future will be swallowed up by darkness.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I think... I want us to become true companions...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Lucia, Lee, Liv, Commander... Everyone from now on is far more compelling than I had imagined.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'I wanted to join, but I found myself out of place...', 4: '1'}
{2: "You've been a part of us for quite some time.", 3: '43'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Commandant, I... I hope I can always come back here...', 4: '1'}
